channel.title: Need help please.I would like to change this so all axes work

item.title: Need help please.I would like to change this so all axes work
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

case 1276: if (objectID == 1276) { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6739) { if (playerLevel[8] >= 1) { if (actionTimer == 1) { sendMessage("You chop the tree..."); setAnimation(867); addSkillXP((25*playerLevel[8]), 8); addItem(1511, 1); actionTimer = 50; } } } else { sendMessage("You need an axe to chop this tree!"); } } break;

Im pretty sure this is my tut you took it from as im the only peep who used a dragon axe. To change it you need to do this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6739 || #### || ####) {

Where the #### are you add the axe ID. Im pretty sure this is how i added multipul axes on my server.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help please.I would like to change this so all axes work

item.title: Need help please.I would like to change this so all axes work
item.dc:creator: @mastermind mastermind
item.description:
@mastermind wrote:

I took wc codes from a tutorial and i can only cut tree with a dragon axe.Can somebody tell me what to change please?
It look like this:(The dragon axe thing is on the 4th line)

case 1276:
if (objectID == 1276)
{
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6739) {
if (playerLevel[8] >= 1) {
if (actionTimer == 1) {
sendMessage(“You chop the tree…”);
setAnimation(867);
addSkillXP((25*playerLevel[8]), 8);
addItem(1511, 1);
actionTimer = 50;
}
}
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need an axe to chop this tree!”);
}
}
break;[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 10:04:55 AM[/size][hr]Any one please?

Read full topic
